## Slotable.assignedSlot() method

Get the slot that this slotable is assigned to.

[https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/\#dom-slotable-assignedslot](https://dom.spec.whatwg.org/#dom-slotable-assignedslot)

```typescript

```
